article_title: WATCH LIVE: Clinton speaks after winning Nevada caucuses
article_text:
White House hopeful Hillary Clinton Hillary Rodham ClintonJoe Scarborough to Clinton: 'Stop lying’ Trump: Watchdog report a 'disaster' for Clinton Poll: Clinton, Sanders in a dead heat in Calif. MORE is speaking to supporters in Las Vegas moments after winning the Democratic Nevada caucuses on Saturday.

ADVERTISEMENT

Clinton eked out a close win over rival

Watch the video above to follow the speech live.
